attributes.review: I downloaded this app and it caused my house to flood and this woman name Karen broke into my house set it on fire then called the police ON ME and said I was disturbing her then my phone blew up causing me to have to buy a whole other phone just for it to be stomped on by Karen again so I finally made a restraining order against her and had to move across the country until she found me again which I found out was BECAUSE OF THIS APP. I am currently hiding from her but I thought everyone should know the dangers of this app.
attributes.title: Terrible App

attributes.review: So I got the app and it was just bad from the beginning. First  of all this app does nothing. I mean NoThInG to make America great again 😡.  It actually makes it worse in my opinion. Like trump is a disgrace to man kind especially cuz of the stuff he says about women 🐸and does to them. Also let’s remember the Cheeto ❗️I’ve seen bigger Cheetos like why a small one nobody wants small Cheetos and I was not surprised when I saw that trump likes small Cheetos . So yah 😈this is my favorite emoji. If you read this hi. Have a good day. Tic tak is hopefully gonna b saved :)
attributes.title: Bad

attributes.review: it was the worst app ever. when i got it i thought it would be great to support daddy donald trump as i always do. but whenever i opened the app i would be greeted with a personalized video from daddy trump telling me how much he hates women🤗. i personally thought it was a nice gesture because i too, a trump supporter, obviously hate women as much as daddy trump. anyway that night after scrolling through his app for almost two hours, i tried to sleep😴. but then i felt something looking at me. i got up and turned on the flashlight on my phone when i realized that trump was now my wallpaper🙀. then i looked out my window and saw him standing there looking at me. i tried to scream but nothing came out. as i stood there silently he slowly faded. i immediately deleted the app and don’t recommend anyone gets it.😾
attributes.title: can’t sleep!!

attributes.review: I’m not part of the whole gen z thing but I felt like I had to alert Apple about the abhorrent condition of this app. The audacity to create and publish such a buggy, confusing, and difficult to use piece of software as a tool for a political campaign is just flat out embarrassing. I really hope that President Trump and his team will step up their game. Not to get too far into politics but I judge a politician based on the little things, like this. If this is all that Trump and his team can do I am not impressed, not impressed at all.
attributes.title: Unfortunate...

attributes.review: I gave it a chance but it was full of bugs and misinformation. It crashed on me over and over again and I could not get it to work no matter how hard I tried- truly terrible. I wish we hadn’t taken the four years to download this app because what we got from it was completely worthless compared to the innumerable issues that became a part of my “phone.” Don’t give this app another chance or your “phone” might completely burst into flames.
attributes.title: This app was terrible

attributes.review: I downloaded the app and I expected great things from it, I thought it was another version of ph but as soon as I got it and looked at the Cheeto it wouldn’t come out so I tried going to Antarctica and see if I could fly a dog but China wouldn’t blow the candles on the burger and so my sister came from the moon to pick me up but I was in a jar of crackers and so we went to mars and it was pretty nice Ngl there was a lot of waffles floated which made me hungry so I ate an alpaca which somehow made me teleport to the White House and I finally came on the Cheeto.
attributes.title: Erectile Dysfunction

attributes.review: i hate this app it is absolutely trashhhh its just the worse dont get this like DON’T get this trust me and besides why would u get this app in the first place unless u want to know what trumps plans are but other than that its pretty useless and its just terrribblleeeeeeeee :) please don’t get this app and help tiktok from not getting banned if u wantttt but anywayyysss this app is booty and smells😳hehehhehehehhehehehhehehehhehehehehhehehehehhehehehehhehehehehehhehehehhehehehehehhehehhehehehehhehehehehhehehehehhehhehehehehehhehehehhehehehhehehehehehhehehehhehehehhehehehe thank you😌
attributes.title: 🦋🧚🏼‍♀️✨this app is booty✨🧚🏼‍♀️🦋

attributes.review: This is a terrible app, couldn’t even get past the first page. Such an aggressive image on the first screen, wasn’t even sure what I was suppose to be looking at. Completely intolerable. Contacted the developer for help, said the app should be working fine and there was no risk of this app infecting my other apps as long as I kept this app away from the others but then I noticed all my apps started to act similarly. Completely ineffective and useless app, all talk and really no substance.
attributes.title: Ruined my phone

attributes.review: so.. i typed in my phone number like it asked.. then my instagram, snapchat, and twitter all get hacked and the passwords of my accounts have been changed so i can’t log in. on my snapchat story there’s dozens of posts saying “trump 2020” and “build the wall” and “ALL LIVES MATTER”. on my instagram, there’s about 20 posts on my feed saying that aswell. and there’s tweets on my account saying “f*** immigrants” and a lot of racist sh*t. they hacked everything and changed the passwords and emails to my things. would give it 0 stars. terrible.
attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD

attributes.review: I had just downloaded this app to see our wonderful president ideas and plans and my fish jumped out of his tank and slapped the phone out my hand. I never been so terrified in my life. He told me that someone turned him into a gold fish (the snack that smiles back) and he went into this demon like universe where the other goldfish had been kept captive. They told him that great president trump was using there golden beautiful scales to turn him orange!???? It all make sense now, I have nightmares everyday about this😞 DO NOT get this app!!!!
attributes.title: NEVER AGAIN😤😤😤
